LOGIN.MOBILE_REG_SUBHEADING: Don't worry we won't pass it to anyone else

ERROR.INVALIDALPHABETSWITHSPACE: Please enter only alphabets with space
ERROR.ALPHABETSWITHNUMBER: Please enter only alphabets and number
ERROR.ALPHABETSWITHSPECIAL: Please use alphabets and number with , . and /
ERROR.MATCHPASSWORD: Confirm Password not matched with Password
ERROR.INVALIDPASSWORD: Invalid password. Password must be at least 6 characters long, and contain a number
